official_title: The Impact of Cannabidiol (CBD) Health Claims at Point-of-Sale on Consumer Perceptions and Behavior: Online Survey
inclusion_criteria:
* Age 18-65
* US Residents
* Satisfies one of the following categories:

  1. Current CBD users
  2. Ever CBD users
  3. Non-CBD users
* Members of the AmeriSpeak™ panel
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Non-English speakers
* Younger than 18 or older than 65
* Not US residents
* Not members of the AmeriSpeak™ panel
